product_name: Nite Ize Lite Ride GT Light Mount
long_description: This Nite Ize Lite Ride GT light mount lets you conveniently mount nearly any handheld flashlight to your handlebar for versatile lighting options. Thermoplastic rubber mount base is designed to cradle most round, barrel-shaped handheld flashlights; base is also finish-friendly so it won't scratch up your handlebar. Mount without tools thanks to super-strong, durable and flexible 9 in. Gear Ties that can be easily bent to wrap around flashlight and handlebar. Gear Ties can be twisted and untwisted numerous times, letting you choose when and where to mount the Lite Ride GT-bikes, poles or straps-even freestanding.
